name: Toon Tanks (itch) (BubbleDncr)
description:
Controls:

  • W:  Move Forward 
  • S:  Move Backward 
  • A:  Turn Left
  • D:  Turn Right
  • Mouse:  Aim 
  • Left Mouse Button:  Fire

Version 1.1 UPDATE! 
Your feedback has been heard! Download Version 1.1 for improved camera angle and enemy fire rates!

A simple tank shooter game created as part of an Udemy Unreal C++ course (https://www.udemy.com/course/unrealcourse/). Currently only one level with the potential for more to be added in the future, as well as quality of life improvements.

The goal of the game is to destroy all the small, gold turrets in the maze. They are protected by three variations of enemy turrets - attackers, healers, and bosses! Destroy all the turrets to get the high score!

*Hint*
Standing between Healing Turrets and their targets can result in them healing you by mistake!
